system.note: Space Marines Only, not easily acquirable.Traditional Weapon of the Dark Angels Space Marine Chapter. Replaces or used in addition to Combat Knife if preferred. Counts as a Chapter Trapping. (Deathwatch Initiate may start with one appropriate Chapter Trapping)
